sentences: Luna Alcalay (21 October 1928 – 9 October 2012) was a Croatian-born Austrian pianist, music educator and composer.
Alcalay was born in Zagreb, Croatia to a Jewish family.
She studied piano under Bruno Seidlhofer and composition under Alfred Uhl at the Vienna Academy of Music and received a scholarship in 1958 to continue her studies in Rome.
After completing her studies, she returned to Vienna, where she became a professor of piano at the Academy of Music and Performing Arts.
En circuit · Der alte Friedhof in Prag (mezzo-soprano and ensemble)
